hopobject.name: buyxM
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.8) Gecko/20100722 Firefox/3.6.8
hopobject.body:
Come here for the latest availability information and list of distributors to buy a BeagleBoard-xM.

The Digi-Key order page went live on June 7th, 2010 and boards arrived at Digi-Key August 23rd. Boards are arriving at a rate of about 200 per week currently. The camera port is validated, but the picture quality still needs some improvements.

The export classification issue for orders outside of the United States and Canada is currently an issue (again, as of September 7th), but we hope to get this resolved today (September 9th).

  • Digi-Key BeagleBoard-xM product purchase page
